name: Uno Space
shortDescription: A space-themed UNO-style card game with classic rules, smooth visuals, and AI opponents that simulate an online multiplayer experience.
fullDescription:
Uno Space reimagines the classic UNO gameplay with a vibrant outer-space theme and sleek animations. Match cards by number or color, use special cards strategically, and race to be the first to play all your cards.

Key Features:

  • Play Modes: Includes VS Computer mode and a simulated 'Multiplayer' option where AI opponents appear with real-like names and profiles, creating the feel of an online match.
  • Classic UNO Rules: Features Skip, Reverse, Draw Two, Wild, and other action cards for authentic gameplay.
  • Player Customization: Choose your name and avatar to personalize your game profile.
  • Cosmic Look & Feel: Enjoy a clean, colorful interface and a fun intergalactic aesthetic.
